column1: #text=Last weekend my girlfriend and I decided we would like to make a special treat for Sunday dinner with our families .
#text=We decided we would make a special dessert to have after the meal .
#text=We went to the grocery store to get some of the ingredients we thought we would need .
#text=Once at the grocery store we chose the dessert we were going to serve as a treat for our guests .
#text=We picked up flour , sugar , and several other ingredients needed to bake a cake .
#text=Once we returned home we started to mix together a batter for our cake .
#text=Once the batter was just right we evenly spread it in a pan and placed it in the oven .
#text=After some time in the oven to bake our cake was ready to take out so we could add frosting .
#text=After the cake cooled we added the frosting and set it aside to wait for our guests to come and try the delicious treat .
